Package org.pircbotx

Core PircBotX classes

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Channel
    Represents a Channel that we're joined to.
    ChannelListEntry
    A channel entry returned from /LIST command
    Colors
    The Colors class provides several static fields and methods that you may find useful when writing an IRC Bot.
    DccChat
    This class is used to allow the bot to interact with a DCC Chat session.
    DccFileTransfer
    This class is used to administer a DCC file transfer.
    DccManager
    This class is used to process DCC events from the server.
    IdentServer
    A simple IdentServer (also know as "The Identification Protocol").
    InputThread
    A Thread which reads lines from the IRC server.
    ManyToManyMap<A,B>
    This is a small custom map that supports a Many to Many relationship, based on 2 core HashMap's with nested HashSet's for performance.
    MultiBotManager
    Manager that provides an easy way to create bots on many different servers with the same or close to the same information.
    OutputThread
    A Thread which is responsible for sending messages to the IRC server.
    PircBotX
    PircBotX is a Java framework for writing IRC bots quickly and easily.
    ReplyConstants
    This interface contains the values of all numeric replies specified in section 6 of RFC 1459.
    ServerInfo
    This is a giant info bean of various things about the server.
    TrustingSSLSocketFactory Deprecated
    This class has been superseded by UtilSSLSocketFactory, which provides much more flexibility and ease of use.
    User
    Represents a User on the server.
    UserSnapshot
    A snapshot of a user in time.
    Utils  
    UtilSSLSocketFactory
    Utility for doing various useful things to an SSL socket factory.
    UtilSSLSocketFactory.TrustingX509TrustManager
    X509TrustManager that trusts all certificates.
